name: AnthraxTestsForBacillisAnthracisAntibody
title: Anthrax (Tests for Bacillis anthracis Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bacillus anthracis antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Bacillus anthracis antibody;  

LOINC search terms: ‘Bacillus anthracis Ab -isolate’),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
